snippet.title: SEGA Astro City Mini - Full Microconsole Tour
snippet.description:
The Sega Astro City Mini is a fully functional miniature version of the full-sized arcade cabinet and it includes 37 playable games such as Virtua Fighter, Golden Axe, and Wonder Boy.

In celebration of its 60th anniversary, Sega is offering a miniature version of its famous arcade cabinet: the Sega Astro City. The Astro City - which was a huge success in the 1990s with over 50,000 terminals installed in Japan alone - for the first time offered to the players the famous 3D fighting game, Virtua Fighter!

With its 4-inch screen, joystick and 6 buttons, you can enjoy a selection of 37 of the most famous Sega games right at the palm of your hand!

Chapters:

00:00:00 - Intro
00:00:40 - Flicky
00:05:20 - Sega Ninja
00:07:40 - My Hero
00:09:46 - Space Harrier
00:12:33 - Fantasy Zone
00:15:50 - Wonder Boy
00:18:36 - Quartet 2
00:22:13 - Alex Kidd with Stella: The Lost Stars
00:26:24 - Alien Syndrome
00:29:03 - Wonder Boy in Monster Land
00:31:05 - Shinobi
00:33:03 - Sonic Boom
00:35:23 - Altered Beast
00:41:47 - Scramble Spirits
00:45:52 - Wonder Boy III: Monster Lair
00:49:35 - Gain Ground
00:55:05 - Crack Down
00:59:50 - Golden Axe
01:03:55 - Cyber Police ESWAT
01:11:43 - Shadow Dancer
01:13:38 - Alien Storm
01:17:34 - Columns
01:24:15 - Bonanza Bros.
01:29:32 - Columns II
01:33:33 - Thunder Force AC
01:37:03 - Rad Mobile
01:42:15 - COTTON: Fantastic Night Dreams
01:45:21 - Arabian Fight
01:52:27 - Golden Axe: The Revenge of Death Adder
01:59:06 - Puyo Puyo
02:01:41 - Dark Edge
02:05:04 - Puzzle & Action: TANT-R
02:10:40 - Virtua Fighter
02:15:12 - Stack Columns
02:20:40 - Puzzle & Action: ICHIDANT-R
02:26:00 - Puyo Puyo 2
02:33:06 - Dottori Kun

(C) SEGA
(C) SEGA / Bandai Namco
(C) SEGA / SUCCESS
(C) SEGA / LAT
